title: Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", ca. 1780
medium: Black chalk, pen and ink, brush and blue water color on paper.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
description: Shown in profile turned toward right.  Urns are at the upper corners.  The panel beside the window is decorated with a scroll and a garland lying upon masks.   The similar motifs decorate the lower panels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Black chalk, pen and ink, brush and blue water color on paper.. Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander. 1900-1-11.
